channel.title: Troubleshooting
channel.description: Get help, tips, and report bugs

item.title: I can't start Duffers
item.author: invalid@example.com (w00ter_[CloWn])
item.dc:creator: w00ter_[CloWn]
item.content:encoded:
When i start up duffers I get the splash screen of duffers soon to be followed by this errormessage:
Runtime Error!
Program D:\UT2004\System\UT2004.exe

This application has requested the Runtime to termintate it in an unusual way. Please contact... blbla

I have no troubles running other mods for ut2004 (SAS, CloneBandits, RO etc). I have tried to delete the ini's and restarting but without success.

Any clue as to what might help?

item.title: Internet Server Browser workaround
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded: The latest version shipped with a small problem that prevents Duffers servers from showing up in the server browser. To remedy this, find the DuffersUser.ini file in the /Duffers/System folder. Find the '[DuffersGUI.DGMultiplayerBrowserBase]' section and set 'bStandardServersOnly' to FALSE. Start Duffers and servers will now be visible in the Internet server browser. This will be the default setting in future versions.

item.title: hit ball- game freezes- returns to tee spot
item.author: invalid@example.com (sycocowz)
item.dc:creator: sycocowz
item.content:encoded:
hey guys I'm having this problem

when ever I hit the ball it starts to go in the air then the game freezes for a few seconds and then it returns me to starting spot

I made a video with fraps, you can see it at
users.starpower.net/cindya2/swing-problem.avi

Note that it looks like that video is clips put together, its one continous clip, those freezes actually happen in game

I have had this problem while running UT2004 builds 3204, 3223, 3227, and 3233

item.title: Impressions of Version 2
item.author: invalid@example.com (W0RF)
item.dc:creator: W0RF
item.content:encoded:
- Wind actually seems to be affecting the ball now, though it's sometimes difficult to tell how much. Also, the arrow is hard to see at times.

- Something I'm very impressed with, the ball hits differently out of different lies - fairway vs. rough vs. sand

- I like that the ball doesn't roll a mile now but it seems to stop a bit too short on fairways and greens. They should be a little smoother than that.

- I'll have to relearn the clubs since I can now hit a 9iron like 130 yards...

Impressions of Version 2

item.title: Swingbug?
item.author: invalid@example.com (-=BYE=-RiptoR)
item.dc:creator: -=BYE=-RiptoR
item.content:encoded:
I was so happy when I saw that the new multiplayer beta was released. Finally some action without having to reinstall UT2004 (I have the 3204 patch ).

But when I started a game, it took me ages to hit the ball. The swingmeter would reset constantly, which gets very annoying after 20 tries.
I know the readme says that there are problems with it, but I'd never would have thought that this means it's virtually impossible to hit the ball.

I also noticed that when you press both left...

Swingbug?

item.title: Majour bug?
item.author: invalid@example.com (addition)
item.dc:creator: addition
item.content:encoded: not sure why but whenever i start a game of single player my player is always stuck and i cant get rid of the hints. I can shoot but he is always aiming way off. After i take the first shot i can aim again, but i still cant get rid of the hint boxes. Also, whats up with the powerswing. what looks like 50% swings like 20%, is this just a bug, or a problem that you guys must tweak?

item.title: Bugs With Screenies
item.author: invalid@example.com (W0RF)
item.dc:creator: W0RF
item.content:encoded:
Shot 1 - 1st hole, 150ish yards off the tee, fairway right:
Ball rolls downhill for 9 years here
Shot 2 - 4th hole, sand trap in front of the green:
You can see I am "in front of" the ball. Also on this shot, I hit the pin and it popped out but it still gave me credit for an eagle (Shot 5)
Shot 3 - 4th hole, 45-foot putt:
Ball spun briefly in front of the hole, then popped and rolled 10 feet past.
Shot 4 - 4th hole, 25-foot putt:
I also had an episode on this green where it rolled...

Bugs With Screenies

item.title: Problem with hitting the ball ...
item.author: invalid@example.com (JaFO)
item.dc:creator: JaFO
item.content:encoded:
After I installed the mod it worked fine (click to swing, click at the end and a final time to hit it)... that was until the 6th or so hole.

Ever since it sort of stopped to work.

It still responds to the first two clicks, but it's as if the meter swings to the end of the circle whenever it is near the spot I ought to click again.

The best I can manage at times is < 25% power shots when I'd need full power.
That is if I can finally hit the ball after dozens of attempts.

I'll...

Problem with hitting the ball ...

item.dc:creator: Sin-
item.content:encoded: When I installed the Duffer's Golf Beta, It said that I had an invalid CD-Key. I Can run the normal game just fine. I am using UT2004. Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: bouncing Ball
item.author: invalid@example.com (Grat)
item.dc:creator: Grat
item.content:encoded: I am having a problem with excessive ball bouncing, it just won't come to rest. On a sloped fareway the ball can bounce for quite a while before coming to a rest. Once the ball continued bouncing in the 2nd or 3rd hole and didn't stop for at least 1 minute, I had to exit the round.

item.title: Umm.putting?
item.author: invalid@example.com (HeLL)
item.dc:creator: HeLL
item.content:encoded: Ok, tried out the game. Took me like 6 strokes to get near the hole. Tried to putt, but he putts the ball backwards. What's up with that?
